trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMKDWEATHERFORECAST_00925_WEATHERFORECAST_000_000<tab>I've been closely monitoring the isle's climatic fluctuations. Perhaps you'd like to know whether to expect rain, shine, or something more esoteric?
TEXT_CTSMKDWEATHERFORECAST_00925_WEATHERFORECAST_000_010<tab>We are currently experiencing an auroral mirage.

TEXT_CTSMKDWEATHERFORECAST_00925_WEATHERFORECAST_000_020<tab>Unfortunately, I've been unable to pinpoint the specific atmospheric conditions that lead to what I have dubbed “auroral mirages,” and thus can't offer precise predictions regarding their timing.
